about-me.portrait-alt: An image of Andre Veltens, working on a MacBook
about-me.title: About me
about-me.subsumption: I am a German-speaking front-end developer based in Paderborn. From my point of view, websites must primarily fulfill two tasks: They have to provide a good user experience and look their best. Realizing such websites is my mission. I am driven by my experience as a former employee in various industries. This has given me the knowledge of how software solutions can be applied in reality and run in a customer-optimized way.

bulletpoints.location: Whether on site in Paderborn or remotely - I work effectively to implement your ideas.
bulletpoints.mind: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
bulletpoints.goals: I like solving issues. Programming is a powerfull and economic way of problem-solving. You can benefit from my knowledge and skills. I'm glad to bring your visions to life.

skills.title: Skill Set
skills.intro: In the meantime, I have worked on various projects.  I have been able to use a variety of frontend technologies and concepts. New technologies and methods do not scare me, but I see them as a means to continuously improve my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.

sub-subheadline.body: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

portfolio.title: Featured Projects
portfolio.expose: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

description.short: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System.
description.long: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

description.short: Object-oriented Jump 'n' Run Game with Highscore-List. Rumble-Feature for Gamepads.
description.long: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

description.short: A Pokédex that uses the Poke API. Provides an options menu.
description.long: A Pokédex that uses the Poke API. Provides an options menu where you can activate an autoload function and switch between classic and modern sounds.

references.title: What my colleagues say about me

phillip-sauer.body: Andre is a focused and dedicated colleague. It's a pleasure to collaborate on a project. He is always there to help, no matter the task.

marcel-menke.body: Andre has both technical know-how and the ability to explain complex issues clearly and comprehensibly. His technical expertise has often helped me and many others.

daniel-h..body: Thanks to his quick comprehension, Mr. Veltens immediately grasps even complex relationships and was always able to quickly familiarize himself with new tasks.

success.base: Your message has been sent successfully.

p.1: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
